name: socceropedia
0:
”Alexa, open soccer coach”
”Alexa, launch soccer coach”
”Alexa, start soccer coach”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: soccer coach
des: This skill is for all the soccer enthusiasts out there. It tells you a host of different soccer terminologies with easy-to-understand explanations. Just say 'Alexa, open soccer coach' or 'Alexa, start soccer coach' or 'Alexa, launch soccer coach' and let Alexa, handle the rest!. We will be constantly updating the database with more soccer terms. Let us know in comments, if you want any specific terms to be part of this amazing skill. Enjoy!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
